statements: UPDATE fraud_detection SET transaction_amount = 500.00 WHERE transaction_id = 1;

UPDATE fraud_detection SET transaction_amount = 1000.50 WHERE transaction_id = 1;
UPDATE fraud_detection SET transaction_date = '2022-03-15', transaction_type = 'Refund' WHERE customer_id = 101 AND transaction_amount >= 500.00;
UPDATE transactions SET amount = 250.50, fraud_status = TRUE WHERE transaction_id = 100;
UPDATE fraud_anomalies SET status = 'Under Review', detected_at = '2022-01-15' WHERE fraud_id = 50;
UPDATE transactions SET amount = 1000.50, fraud_status = TRUE WHERE transaction_id = 12345;
UPDATE fraud_anomalies SET status = 'Under Investigation', detected_at = '2022-05-15 10:30:00' WHERE fraud_id = 54321;
UPDATE Fraudsters SET is_suspected_fraudster = TRUE WHERE user_id = 12345;
UPDATE Transactions SET is_fraudulent = TRUE, amount = 1000.00 WHERE transaction_id = 98765;
UPDATE Fraudsters SET is_suspected_fraudster = TRUE WHERE username = 'JohnDoe';
UPDATE Transactions SET is_fraudulent = FALSE, transaction_date = '2022-01-15' WHERE amount > 1000 AND is_fraudulent = TRUE;
UPDATE transactions SET amount = 100.50, isNewCustomer = TRUE WHERE transaction_id = 'e2a57d04-7d8e-4307-a4cb-3e59d50c28bc';
UPDATE customers SET phone_number = '+1234567890', address = '123 Main St' WHERE customer_id = '2ead60c0-2e12-4925-a958-446fa8eae4a2';
